TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebInvokeAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class WebInvokeAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IOperationBehavior
public ref class WebInvokeAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IOperationBehavior
type WebInvokeAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IOperationBehavior

summary.span: 代表屬性，這個屬性表示服務作業在邏輯上為叫用作業，可由 WCF REST 程式設計模型呼叫。

span.span: Represents an attribute indicating that a service operation is logically an invoke operation and that it can be called by the WCF REST programming model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了 之外，還對服務作業套用 屬性，並且將作業與 `UriTemplate` 以及表示叫用的基礎傳輸動詞 (例如，HTTP POST、PUT 或 DELETE) 產生關聯。The attribute is applied to a service operation in addition to the and associates the operation with a `UriTemplate` as well as an underlying transport verb that represents an invocation (for example, HTTP POST, PUT, or DELETE). 屬性是*被動*作業行為 (方法會執行任何動作)，將中繼資料加入至作業描述。The attribute is a *passive* operation behavior (the methods do nothing) that adds metadata to the operation description. 套用 屬性至服務作業並不會起作用，除非在作業描述 (例如 ) 中尋找此中繼資料的行為，已新增至服務的行為集合中。Applying the attribute to a service operation has no effect unless a behavior that looks for this metadata in the operation description (such as ) is added to the service's behavior collection. 可決定服務作業所回應的 HTTP 方法。The determines what HTTP method that a service operation responds to. 根據預設，已套用 的所有方法都會回應 POST 要求。By default, all methods that have the applied respond to POST requests. 屬性可讓您指定不同的 HTTP 方法。The property allows you to specify a different HTTP method. 如果您要服務作業回應 GET，請改為使用 。If you want a service operation to respond to GET, use the instead. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 由於下列程式碼並未指定 屬性，因此會將所有的服務作業對應至 HTTP POST 方法。Because the property is not specified in the following code, all service operations are mapped to the HTTP POST method. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Web::WebMessageBodyStyle BodyStyle { System::ServiceModel::Web::WebMessageBodyStyle get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Web::WebMessageBodyStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得並設定於服務作業來回傳送的訊息本文樣式。

span.span: Gets and sets the body style of the messages that are sent to and from the service operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定為 時，服務作業的結果直接寫到回應訊息的本文中。When set to , the result of the service operation is written directly to the body of the response message. > [!NOTE] > 接受 並傳回 void 的作業由格式器專門處理。Operations that take a and return void are handled specially by the formatters. 格式器不會在回應中發出包裝函式名稱，即使 是設為 也一樣。The formatters do not emit the wrapper name in the response even if is set to . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#6)]

value.span: 此值會指定是否曾經明確設定 屬性。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the property was set explicitly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設計來由 WCF 基礎結構，而且絕對不會從使用者程式碼設定。This property is designed to be used by the WCF infrastructure and should never be set from user code.

span.span: The protocol method associated with the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設為 POST。 defaults to POST. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定對服務作業提出的要求格式。This property determines the format of requests made to a service operation. 可能值為 `Xml` 和 `Json`。The possible values are `Xml` and `Json`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定服務作業發出的回應格式。This property determines the format of responses sent from a service operation. 可能值為 `Xml` 和 `Json`。The possible values are `Xml` and `Json`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會執行任何動作，因為 屬性是被動作業行為。This method does nothing because the attribute is a passive operation behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UriTemplate { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.UriTemplate : string with get, set

summary.span: 服務作業的統一資源識別元 (URI) 範本。

span.span: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) template for the service operation.

value.span: 服務作業的 URI 範本。

span.span: The URI template for the service operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URI 範本用來決定哪些要求分派給哪些服務作業。URI templates are used to determine which requests get dispatched to which service operations. URI 範本允許您將 URI 或 URI 集合對應至服務作業。URI templates allow you to map a URI or a set of URIs to a service operation. 如需 URI 範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[UriTemplate 與 UriTemplateTable](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/uritemplate-and-uritemplatetable.md)For more information about URI templates, see [UriTemplate and UriTemplateTable](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/uritemplate-and-uritemplatetable.md) ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#9)]
